titleStmt.title: A proclamation for adjourning of the Parliament, from the 20 December to the 1 of March thereafter.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order of Privy Council,

notesStmt.note: Dated: Given at Edinburgh, the fourth day of December, one thousand six hundred and eighty nine years.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: creased and stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
